Retrieve the fullest extent of tweet metadata for more than 90,000 tweets

Source: R/setup-functions.R
lookup_many_tweets.Rd

This function calls pull_tweet_data(), but has a built in delay of 15 minutes to all the Twitter API to reset after looking up 90,000 tweets.

lookup_many_tweets(x, alarm = FALSE)

Arguments

x

A list or vector of tweet ID numbers
alarm

An audible notification that a batch of 90,000 tweets has been completed

Value

A dataframe of tweets and full metadata from the Twitter API

Contents

Developed by K. Bret Staudt Willet, Joshua M. Rosenberg, Spencer P. Greenhalgh.
